rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565234

If you specifically want hairdressers, but not other personal care/beauty businesses, to be allowed to open, we could accept a petition requesting this, but you would need to provide your full name in order for us to accept your petition.
